content: your preferred method neckband join to work in the round making sure that the cast-on edge is not twisted and divide the work in half using the magic loop technique work in 1x1 rib k1 p1 knit the rib as wide as you wish in size small i knitted a 3 cm rib dividing for raglan after the margin divide the stitches for raglan increases without working the sts by placing markers on both sides of the 1 raglan stitch a total of 8 stitch markers as follows 17 18 19 19 21 sts right back 1 raglan st 14 14 14 16 16 sts right sleeve 1 raglan st 34 36 38 38 42 sts front 1 raglan st 14 14 14 16 16 sts left sleeve 1 raglan st 17 18 19 19 21 sts left back the beginning of the round is placed in the middle of the back where in the beginning the work joined in the round page 2 of 9 notes before you start knitting during raglan increases and elevation size s in r5 m in r7 and l&xl in r9 will begin to prepare the lace pattern to prepare means that depending on your size only the border purl stitches of the side patterns on the chart will be performed and the lace pattern itself will start in row 10 after the elevation see chart for the lace pattern place markers on the front to be prepared for the lace pattern the lace pattern is divided into three parts because the lace pattern includes odd numbers we will increase one stitch in the middle of the front from the stitches between but only in row 9 raglan increases & elevation now work short row to shape the neckline while at the same time work raglan increases on both sides of the raglan stitch use the bobby pin elevation technique when working short row for detailed instructions see video at hunglish knitter youtube channel work as follows row 1 rs knit to marker m1r knit raglan stitch m1l knit to the next marker right sleeve m1r knit raglan stitch m1l k1 place bobby pin turn 4 sts have been increased row 2 ws purl to beginning of the round to the tail of yarn purl to marker m1r purl raglan stitch m1l purl to marker left sleeve m1r purl raglan stitch m1l p1 place bobby pin turn 4 sts have been increased row 3 rs knit to beginning of the round to the tail of yarn knit to marker m1r knit raglan stitch m1l knit to the next marker right sleeve m1r knit raglan stitch m1l knit to the gap pick up the stitch with the bobby pin from behind place it on the left needle and knit the next two stitches together k1 place bobby pin turn 4 sts have been increased row 4 ws purl to beginning of the round to the tail of yarn purl to marker m1r purl raglan stitch
